relation: Focusing on precision equipment and opto-digital systems, OLYMPUS pioneers key technologies for both, consumers and industry. The major profession is in the fields of imaging and information systems Analogue and digital cameras, digital printer and accessories, microcassette tape recorders, digital voice recorders, optical data storage systems, multimedia displays and binoculars. Medical systems and life sciences endoscopes, microscopes, diagnostics and other advanced medical equipments. Industrial instruments applications microscopes, remote visual inspection (non-destructive internal testing), high speed video and security applications.
